code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{addTask}from'../features/tasks/taskslice';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Taskinput=()=>{const[text,setText]=useState('');const dispatch=useDispatch();const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(text.trim()){dispatch(addTask(text));setText('');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:text,onChange:e=>setText(e.target.value),placeholder:"Add a new task"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Add Task"})]});};export default Taskinput;
